scripts.dev: pnpm run clean:cache && nuxt prepare && pnpm run build:electron && tsx scripts/electron-run.ts start
scripts.dev:quick: pnpm run build:electron && tsx scripts/electron-run.ts start
scripts.dev:fast: pnpm run build:electron && concurrently -k "nuxt dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3235 && electron ."
scripts.build:electron: esbuild electron/main.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist-electron/main.js --external:electron && esbuild electron/preload.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist-electron/preload.js --external:electron && esbuild electron/ocr/ocr-worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist-electron/ocr-worker.js --external:electron
scripts.copy:pdfjs: mkdir -p public/pdf/standard_fonts public/pdf/cmaps public/pdf/wasm public/pdf/iccs && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs public/pdf/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/standard_fonts/* public/pdf/standard_fonts/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/cmaps/* public/pdf/cmaps/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/wasm/* public/pdf/wasm/ && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/iccs/* public/pdf/iccs/
scripts.validate: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run lint && pnpm run build
